Projects

  • Persóna

    Persóna was created during the nFactorial AI Cup. nFactorial AI Cup was a generative AI hackathon for developers, which took place from April 7 to 9, 2023. I participated in the App track, the goal was to create an app in 48 hours using any available generative AI.

  • Nefis Food

    Nefis Food is a company founded by my relatives that makes sugar, coffee and other products. They needed a digital presence for their brand in the form of a website, and I helped them with that.

Now

Currently, I work as a frontend developer at Globerce Capital,
in a team where we build a delivery management system
for any business.
